panels.visual: The party escapes through an underwater passage, emerging exhausted on a moonlit shore. They've made camp, the staff carefully laid beside sleeping Whortheus.
Morning light. Armando sits up in alarm. Where the staff lay, only a small dreidel and a mocking thank-you note remain. His expression shifts from confusion to rage.
panels.dialogue: Armando: "The staff - it's gone! 'Thanks for the help. -Godrick the Golden'"

panels.visual: Wide shot: Eurostras spins the dreidel experimentally. Golden light erupts as Gimel the Golden Golem manifests - a friendly five-foot construct of polished gold, coins visible through joints, Hebrew letter glowing on forehead. The party stares in amazement.
panels.dialogue: Gimel: "Hello! I am Gimel. How may I assist you?"
